Donald Rumsfeld wrote that he never authorized waterboarding-- simulated drowning-- but he also called CIA interrogators who used the interrogation technique "patriots, not criminals." The questioning of those in department of defence custody provided information that saved innocent American lives. I make no apology for that, he also wrote. Donald Rumsfeld , 78, served as defence secretary in two separate Republican administrations, becoming both the youngest and oldest man to hold the job. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult That's Eric Schmidt : So long to the Google Inc. chief who wasn't For six years, Larry Page and Sergey Brin told Eric Schmidt that Google Inc. should build its own browser, and for six years, he resisted. " Google Inc. was a small company, Eric Schmidt remembered. "Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again."
